languages.text: "Каждый псайкер на борту должен быть уничтожен. Очистите огнем каждый закуток этого судна!"

traits.locale_text: "Убивайте каждого псайкера, которого встретите. Очищайте огнем каждый отсек. Вышибайте их мутировавшие мозги, чтобы прикончить их наверняка".

languages.text: "Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"
languages.original_text: "Каждый псайкер на борту должен быть уничтожен. Очистите огнем каждый закуток этого судна!"

traits.locale_text: "Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"
"Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"
"Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"
"Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"

languages.text: “必须把船上所有灵能者全都杀光！用火焰净化每个区域！”
languages.original_text: "Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"

traits.locale_text: “杀死每个灵能者，用火焰净化每个区域。砸碎他们变异的大脑，确保他们真的死透了。”

languages.text: «Todos los psíquicos a bordo deben morir. ¡Purguen cada rincón de esta nave con fuego!».
languages.original_text: "Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"

traits.locale_text: «Maten a todos los psíquicos al verlos. Purguen todos los compartimentos con fuego. Aplasten sus cerebros mutantes para asegurarse de que no sobreviven».

languages.text: 「船内の異能者をすべて始末しろ。船を隅々まで炎で浄化するんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"

traits.locale_text: 「異能者をすべて殺せ。すべての区画を炎で浄化しろ。変異した脳を破壊し、確実に死に至らせろ」

languages.text: "Alle Psioniker an Bord müssen vernichtet werden. Reinigt jeden Winkel des Schiffs mit Feuer!"
languages.original_text: "Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"

traits.locale_text: "Tötet alle Psioniker, die Euch begegnen. Reinigt alle Abteile mit Feuer. Schlagt ihre mutierten Gehirne ein, damit sie garantiert tot sind."

languages.text: « Tous les psykers présents à bord doivent être abattus. Purifiez par les flammes les moindres recoins de ce vaisseau ! »
languages.original_text: "Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"

traits.locale_text: « Tirez sur les psykers à vue. Purifiez chaque compartiment par le feu. Fracassez leurs cerveaux de mutants pour ne prendre aucun risque. »

languages.text: "Gemideki bütün ruhsezerler yok edilecek. Geminin her santimini alevlerle temizleyin!"
languages.original_text: "Every psyker on board must be destroyed. Cleanse every inch of this ship with fire!"

traits.locale_text: "Gemideki bütün ruhsezerler yok edilecek. Geminin her santimini alevlerle temizleyin!"
